title: Large 2-Bedrooms-2 Bath Renovated
posting_body: ['If you are looking for a quality neighborhood and luxurious apartment homes in a prime location, you will find it all at Shaker Park East.', 'Quiet living located in prestigious Shaker Heights, Shaker Park East Apartments is only minutes from University Circle, The Cleveland Clinic, Case Western Reserve University, and downtown Cleveland.', 'A terrific place to call home.', 'Shaker Heights CSD.', 'Garage Parking.', 'Central AC, Updated Kitchen and Flooring.', 'Roof Top sundeck.', 'CURRENT PROMO:  50% off 2nd Month', 'Rent or 2nd monh FREE on 2YR leases + additional monthly discounts.', 'Go to <URL> or', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'for pricing, video tours or onsite tours', '2BDR/2BA suites starting at $1,314/month']
